channel.title: Eros Private Server!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Q2cpwaA.png[/img][/center]
[center]Forum: [url=http://www.Erosps.com]www.Erosps.com[/url] Click the "Play Now" button to download the desktop client.[/center]
[center]Hi i don't really have much to say. This server got a very active staff team which is really good if you need any help. The community is very helpful also. We also have a lot of cool features which i'll be showing you in the pictures down below. [/center] [size=14pt]Bosses[/size]
[ul][li]King Black Dragon[/li] [li]Chaos Elemental[/li] [li]Barelchest Boss[/li] [li]Daggonoth Kings[/li] [li]Callisto[/li] [li]Venenatis[/li] [li]Scorpia[/li] [li]Vet'ion[/li] [li]Giant Sea Snake[/li] [li]All godsword bosses[/li][/ul]
[size=14pt]Minigames[/size]
[ul][li]Barrows[/li] [li]Pest Control[/li] [li]Jad[/li] [li]Duel Arena[/li] [li]Warriors Guild[/li] [li]Barbarian Assault[/li][/ul]
[center][size=12pt]Hit that "Spoiler" button to see some pictures! :)[/size][/center] [center][spoiler] [center][size=12pt]Starter Pack + Bank[/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/qCF2EEx.png[/img][/center] [center][size=12pt]Clan chat 100% Working with ranks![/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6yEb4tn.png[/img][/center] [center][size=12pt]Donator Shop![/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/15IzCPp.png[/img][/center] [center][size=12pt]Voting Shop![/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/g7Ws4Cd.png[/img][/center] [center][size=12pt]Giant Sea Snake[/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/K2fhQCm.png[/img][/center] [center][size=12pt]Kraken[/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7TN1.png[/img][/center] [center][size=12pt]All godwars bosses works![/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/S9rDXvX.png[/img][/center] [center][size=12pt]Zamorak![/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/RxCuC6O.png[/img][/center] [center][size=12pt]Saradomin![/size] [img]http://i.imgur.com/XQdGkRi.png[/img][/center] [/spoiler] [/center] [center][size=12pt]Hope i see you ingame and have a good one! :) // Sitrus[/size][/center]

item.title: Eros Private Server!
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Project Runescape:

donator shop only tells me pay to play.

Yep. Stuff in the store look far too OP. Wouldn’t recommend playing this if that’s still the case.

Read full topic

item.title: Eros Private Server!
item.dc:creator: @quickscapebeta quickscapebeta
item.description:
@quickscapebeta wrote:

[center][/center]

[center]Forum: www.Erosps.com
Click the “Play Now” button to download the desktop client.[/center]

[center]Hi i don’t really have much to say. This server got a very active staff team which is really good if you need any help. The community is very helpful also. We also have a lot of cool features which i’ll be showing you in the pictures down below.
[/center]
[size=14pt]Bosses[/size]

[li]Barelchest Boss[/li]

[li]Jad[/li]
[li]Duel Arena[/li]
[li]Warriors Guild[/li]
[li]Barbarian Assault[/li][/ul]
